Il Pirata [unknown arranger]
Dearham, Cumbria, England, UK Prizes - 1st 20 guineas and cup, 2nd 12 guineas, 3rd 8 guineas, 4th 5 guineas, 5th 4 guineas. March contest - 1st(£2.10s.) Blackburn's Steelworks, 2nd(£1.10s.) Standfast Works. Promoted by Dearham Horticultural Society. 9 bands competed.
Nov. 17, 2013, 4:35 p.m. Jan. 18, 2019, 4:19 p.m.
